definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: Status indicators and controls for air-handling systems.
sentences.chinese: 对于空气处理系统的状态指示器和控制装置。

sentences.english: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.chinese: 当刻度指示器指向规定的位置，放开脚踏板。

sentences.english: This measure may be an indicator of test effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 这个测量可以当作测试效力的指示器。

sentences.english: The name of the currently-selected field-of-view indicator.
sentences.chinese: 目前选取的视场指示器的名称。

sentences.english: A long-term view reinforces the impact of market orientation on output indicators (mainly business performance and esprit de corps as conceptualized by Kohli and Jaworski, 1990).
sentences.chinese: 长期的视野加强市场定方位对输出指示器的冲击。

sentences.english: The DR3 should be used in conjunction with other indicators.
sentences.chinese: DR3应该与其它指示器联合起来应用。

sentences.english: Given this sample test, it's really only a percent complete indicator.
sentences.chinese: 对于本示例测试，它真的只是百分比完成指示器。

sentences.english: Suppresses the disassembly progress indicator pop-up window.
sentences.chinese: 取消反汇编进度指示器弹出窗口的显示。
象质指示器当量灵敏度。

sentences.english: The TIOBE Programming Community index is an indicator of the popularity of programming languages.
sentences.chinese: 这个TIOBE编程社区指数指示器流行的编程语言。

sentences.english: M47 : Automatic carabiner without fall indicator.
sentences.chinese: 不带下坠指示器的自动抓钩。

sentences.english: Each value is associated with a minimum range and a status indicator.
sentences.chinese: 每个值都与一个最低范围和状态指示器关联。

sentences.english: Oil filtering unit has equipped with pollution indicator.
sentences.chinese: 滤油器附有污染指示器。

sentences.english: For example, log utilization rate is an example of an upper bounded threshold indicator.
sentences.chinese: 例如，日志利用率是一个设有上界的阈值指示器。

sentences.english: Annunciators are typically used in applications where the equipment monitored is not located in a portion of the facility that is normally attended.
sentences.chinese: 指示器通常使用在监测设备不在设备现场的应用。

sentences.english: Green laser pointers are a great way to extend that courtesy.
sentences.chinese: 绿激光指示器用在此处最理想。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
